message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the sale of our premium product with you. It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to acquire a truly unique item. I'm willing to start the negotiation with an offer of $1,200,000. I believe this is a fair starting point, considering the product's value to you.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. While I agree this product has value, I believe your starting price is a bit high for me. I'd be willing to purchase the product for $800,000.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your concerns about the price, but I believe the product's value to you is higher than that. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer a price of $1,100,000. I think this is a more reasonable compromise, considering the product's unique features and benefits.

Alice, I appreciate you coming down on the price, but we're still a ways off. I can go up to $900,000 for the product. I think that's a fair offer considering it's still below your initial asking price.

I understand that we're still far apart, Bob. However, I'm willing to make another concession. I'll meet you at $1,000,000, which is the lowest price I'm willing to accept. I believe this is a fair compromise, considering the product's value to you. If we can't agree on this price, I'll have to consider other options.
